CustomField.description: This hidden field will store the actual date of the loan anniversary and is used in report filtering, but is not displayed in the UI.
CustomField.formula:
IF(IsWon,
IF( AND(DAY(CloseDate)=29, MONTH(CloseDate)=2), IF(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), 3,1)>= TODAY(), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),3,1), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,3,1)),
IF(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(CloseDate), DAY(CloseDate))>= TODAY(), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(CloseDate), DAY(CloseDate)), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1, MONTH(CloseDate), DAY(CloseDate)))
)
, null )
CustomField.label: Loan Anniversary Date
